Portal é um grande jogo. Apesar da história ser curta, é possível jogar de novo por várias vezes. As mecânicas são muito inovadoras e interessantes. Possivelmente o melhor Puzzle dos últimos anos.

Portal is a game I think about.  I think about the mechanics sometimes, how they fit together and how Valve fits them into levels.  I think about the story- how it tells you everything up front while also holding so much back.  This is a game I could play once a year.  Though, I don't.  If I did I think I would continue to find it scratches an otherwise untampered with itch.
One of the funniest games that can still be played.
The second best puzzle adventure game I've ever played (only follows it's sequel, Portal 2).  The wit is on point, the puzzles are interesting, and the mechanics unique.  All around fantastic game.
Forever one of my favourite games of all time.
This game is really good and you'll have to think pretty hard for some puzzles
Portal была, есть и будет моей самой любимой игрой среди головоломок, чего только стоят дополнительные челенджи и усложнённые камеры!
Timeless master piece

If you haven't played portal yet, you really should. It is an awesome puzzle game, and I'd recommend playing it if you are new to first person shooter type games, or just want an interesting puzzle game.

多的详细的分析就不多说了，前面已经有大神说的很清楚来了，从想法创新上了来说，真的是绝了，第一人称射击解谜类，冲这点，绝对推荐。

其次，抛开玩法的创新，剧情虽然老套但真的不难受，有些老套的剧情的游戏真的玩的我略尴尬，portal主要还是讲的自由，我觉得。虽然应该是未来的事，但很有代入感，有时候游戏作为我心目中的第九大艺术，这种交互的体验往往比直接告诉你这个道理或者这句话要真实和深刻很多，比如接下来来我要说的portal告诉你去怀疑一切一样，你不去玩很难感受到。说到这是真心推荐，也不贵多年前的游戏各个方面现在看也不差。

还有，评论里也有提到晕3D略严重，在这游戏以前呢，我一直不知道什么是晕3D，然后我就长见识了，很难连续玩一两小时以上，不然真的是超难受......

总之，很不错，推荐，晕3D的又看吧
The perfect combination of wit and puzzle solving.
A fun classic that is mindbender for all with crazy and fun puzzles for all gamers!

For me, Portal was a completely new problem solving game!

The idea and gameplay was like nothing I had played before -- and I've played a good deal of adventure, arcade, RPG, problem-solving, etc.

Very well put together game.  Plenty of humor mixed in to keep it interesting.  Challenging, to say the least.  But overall, completely fun from start to finish!
A classic puzzle game that anybody, even those that don't like puzzle games, should play. Holds up well and is really funny at times.

This game series is my favorite! I come back to play it a couple times a year and its still as fun as day one. Really hope they add a new addition to the series soon.
It is fantastic.

My pick for the THE “WHOOOAAAAAAA, DUDE!” award. Not ony does the  game change the way you think about what is possible, it's full of clever black humor, great puzzle design, lovable companions- and then there's the ending. If you don't know the portal memes (don't spoil it for yourself by looking for them), the end will blow your mind. Probably even twice.

A really unique puzzle game with great graphics and a funny sense of humor. It takes about 4-5 hours to complete the main storyline (and I'm kind of bad at puzzles). Even if you get stuck, there's plenty of helpful walkthroughs to watch online. Definitely worth it, especially when it's on sale.

9/10 for brevity.

This review is not a lie!
Great entertaining and hilarious puzzle game and for the money that it is going for right now you cant get any better

原先一直想玩这个系列的游戏，然而没有优惠，这次趁着黑五入了1-2合集。高兴！废话不说了，现在开始评测！
画面;8/10 
作为07年的游戏，这样的画面也可以接受。如今看来略显粗糙，但是在当时绝对是一个画面很好的游戏。
音乐：8.5/10
建议大家，不要停这别的音乐玩这个游戏，可以带着耳机玩，音乐会营造出一种很紧张，内心纠结的赶脚。这个游戏的音乐还是很应景的，但是还有进步的空间。
玩法：9.3/10
传送门的玩法绝对是新颖独特的，视觉，空间，还有用到物理的知识。让人玩起来，有一种“还能这样”的赶脚。玩家只能用两个门（一黄一蓝），但是有很多技巧（用反复跳达到超级跳，高处下落达到高速度 ETC）游戏里的炮台真的很恶心，不过你可以“隔空取物”，炮台站着很恶心看见你就一直打你，但是拿起来以后，还是很萌的。
平均：8.6/10 总的来说portal还是很有意思的一部小游戏，本人通关但是成就没有全解锁。因为被视觉的切换弄得实在晕，不过这也是游戏的特色之一。
（第一次测评游戏多谢支持，嘿嘿。）
Very good game which can take test of time.
